title: Forum Guidelines
content: Please be reminded that this forum is a place for constructive discussion and learning. We expect all members to adhere to these guidelines and treat each other with respect.

title: The future of debate bots
content: As debate bots become more advanced, how do you think they will impact the learning process in debate clubs and the broader educational sector?
